headlines: Bitcoin climbed above $90,000 for the first time in almost a week
Climb comes after more than a month-long selloff
Stay tuned for updates on Bitcoin's price movement
final_production_data.tts_script: Bitcoin climbed above $90,000 for the first time in almost a week, clawing back ground after a more than a month-long selloff.

original_raw_news.original_title: Bitcoin Tops $90,000 as Options Point Toward Shifting Sentiment
original_raw_news.original_summary: Bitcoin climbed above $90,000 for the first time in almost a week, clawing back ground after a more than a month-long selloff, as a broad rally in risk assets and easing volatility gave traders room to push higher.
